input.sentences: we arrived at the park late afternoon .
the ferris wheel looked really awesome against the evening sky .
at night fall the park lit up with decorations .

output.sentences: Unfortunately we arrived late to the park.
When the Ferris wheel stopped at the top we took a moment and looked at the sky.
There are so many rides to choose from.
The park looks so pretty at night when it's all lit up.
We stayed until close to watch the the fireworks in the sky.
